info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 01 at 3:43PM EST until January 02 at 1:00PM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM EST /NOON CST/ SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches. Locally higher amounts possible, especially near Lake Michigan. * WHERE...In Indiana, La Porte and St. Joseph Counties. In Michigan, Berrien and Cass Counties. * WHEN...From 1 PM EST /noon CST/ this afternoon to 1 PM EST /noon CST/ Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult, especially tonight into Sunday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The greatest snow accumulations are expected this evening into the overnight hours. Additional lighter accumulations remain possible Sunday as a lake effect band moves in from northwestern Indiana.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
